Michael Vick is coming off the best season of his career, leading the Eagles to an NFC East title. "I'm enjoying the guys and I'm enjoying being out here playing football," he said. This is what you work for. You work hard to get in this position. I'm ecstatic to be here. Michael Vick was selected to start Sunday after leading the NFC with more than 1.5 million votes, far ahead of Minnesota Vikings running back Adrian Peterson , the NFC's second-leading vote-getter at 948,410. But given Eric Schmidt 's success, "the board clearly wants to retain his guidance for the next four years." It's a signal to shareholders that he'll continue to steer the boat, Wise added.
